summary: Innovative Product Manager with 6+ years of experience driving digital transformation and leading cross-functional teams. Expert in agile methodologies, user research, and data-driven decision making. Proven track record of launching successful products that increased user engagement by 40% and revenue by 25%.

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager
duties: Led product strategy for mobile applications serving 500K+ active users
Collaborated with engineering teams to deliver 15+ feature releases per quarter
Conducted user research and A/B testing, resulting in 35% improvement in conversion rates
Managed $2M annual product budget and coordinated with 3 external vendor partnerships
Presented product roadmaps to C-level executives and board members
Implemented agile methodologies across 4 product teams, reducing delivery time by 30%

jobs.title: Product Manager
duties: Owned product lifecycle for e-commerce platform with $50M+ annual revenue
Defined product requirements and user stories for 8-person development team
Analyzed market trends and competitive landscape to inform product decisions
Launched new payment integration feature, increasing checkout completion by 22%
Worked closely with UX designers to improve user experience and accessibility
Managed product backlog and prioritized features based on business impact

jobs.title: Associate Product Manager
duties: Supported product development for SaaS platform with 10K+ enterprise customers
Created detailed product specifications and technical documentation
Coordinated with marketing team to develop go-to-market strategies
Conducted customer interviews and surveys to gather product feedback
Assisted in data analysis and reporting for product performance metrics
Participated in sprint planning and daily standup meetings

jobs.title: Business Analyst
duties: Analyzed business processes and identified opportunities for improvement
Created detailed requirements documentation for software development projects
Worked with stakeholders to define project scope and deliverables
Developed data models and reports using SQL and Tableau
Supported implementation of new CRM system affecting 200+ users
Trained end users on new systems and provided ongoing support

education: Master of Business Administration (MBA) in Technology Management from University of Texas at Austin (2018)
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from Texas A&M University (2016)
